_header: Saint Valentine of custom year by year
Subjects: Valentine, saint; Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; envoys
_description: John Lydgate, on Saint Valentine’s Day, of similar theme and content with 4769, and having same first stanza — twelve rhyme royal stanzas

BodRawPoe36.First Lines:
[S]Ent valentyn of custom yere be yereMen haue in vsans in thys
                    regioun…
BodRawPoe36.Last Lines:
…Where ygnorance causeth such offenceWyth oute malyce menyng
                    nat but treuthe
BodRawPoe36.Editions:
Mahir,  Otto,
                        ed.  
             Eine religiöse Gedichte John Lydgates.
         Oberviechtach: Adolf Mahir, 1910: 39-42.
MacCracken,  Henry Noble,
                        ed.  
             John Lydgate: The Minor Poems, Vol. I: Religious Poems.
